title: Rec - The Movie (unofficial fan edit)
description:
This is the entire series of "Rec" edited into a single movie.
Since the series consists of ten 12-minute episodes (each with 90-second intros) with a cohesive storyline throughout, I thought it could be edited into a movie with good results.
The translation (which I take absolutely no credit for) was made by the Ayu fansub group: http://www.ayu-anime.net/
